text: Omo yo, watashi-tachi ryonin o, anata ni fukuju, kie suru mono 〔musurimu〕 ni shite kudasai. Mata watashi-tachi no shison o mo, anata ni fukuju, kie suru min 〔unma〕 ni shite kudasai. Watashi-tachi ni saigi o shimeshi, awaremi o ataete kudasai. Anata wa tabitabi yurusa reru kata, jihibukai ho de ara reru
